TopicTitle: 100 ways to get kicked out of wallmart

Articles.Content: 164.go and do everything from this thread.
165: Use the PA system in front of an employee to say that North Korean ICBM's are on the way to your country.
166.tell everyone on the PA system that there is a total of 5 Nuclear warheads coming ,and the U.S missile defense had fail to stop them.
167: Streak while yelling conspiracy theories.
168.say that meteorite the size of texas is going to hit in less than a hour.
169: Hide in the clothing racks with a brick. If people are spending too much time at the rack, brick 'em in the head.
170.tell the manager that pooped in the food section.
171: Throw fragile things at the checkouts without paying
172.make a device that breaks fragile items when you meet the manager.
173: Come up with a plot to get the manager in the restroom. Once he's in the restroom, bang his head on the the toilets and knock him out.

174

Find the manager and pretend you work for Target and try to get him/her to work for you
175.cover the floor with butter.
176: On a day of military rememberance, dress up like a well-known enemy (Historical or current) that your country's military has fought. Try to recruit others to join your military.
177. Release this: http://i50.tinypic.com/30c83nn.jpg Warning, Spider!
178.vomit on the manager
179. Sneak a hammer in and go wild on the electronics
180. Go completely insane and try to eat everything and everyone!
181. Sneak in Meijer price tags and nail them besides the Walmart ones for comparison.
182.bring a water fight to the store.
183. Roundhouse kick all of the employees.
184.push employees to the ground.
185. Tap-dance on the employees.
186.ask for the nearest target.

186.ask for the nearest target.

Yeah, this works, but not always.

187: Going into the same Wal-Mart store at least 5 times a day.
188.go ,and spill liquids every 5 seconds
